channel.title: Man thats a lot of weed
channel.description:
Man how much do you think is here: [img]http://www.myconfinedspace.com/watermark.php?src=wp-content/uploads/2006/10/ton-of-weed.jpg[/img]
Hint hint hint... theres a clue and a answer when you quote me lol thats gonna take a long time to smoke, or sell, depending on who buys... comment
If in wrong section please move...

item.title: Man thats a lot of weed
item.dc:creator: @Zach1188 Zach1188
item.description:
@Zach1188 wrote:

I have to be honest, Arvada (my city) weed sucks. It costs around $300 for an oz. of chronic. In other cities in Colorado, you can get better stuff, like Thai, for cheaper. And I’ve never seen bubblegum weed here

Read full topic
item.source: Man thats a lot of weed

item.title: Man thats a lot of weed
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

[quote=“jme_009, post:35, topic:80372”][quote author=bootnecklad link=topic=118045.msg1168226#msg1168226 date=1176759183]
meh sell it in small amounts and get higher amount, or isnt that a good idea?
[/quote]

How are you going to find like 1,000,000 customers? And the more you sell to people, the higher risk you have of being caught. Sure you’ll make less money if you sell it in high amounts but you can get it off your chest quickly and make your money much quicker.

Someone who I buy from if I need some at the last minute recently sold to some 14 year old girls. They went home and their parents caught them with the weed. Of course they would start flipping out and probably scare the shit out of the girls and asked where they got it from. They told them who it was, and so they called the cops and he got busted. He’s on probation and still selling hehe :P[/quote]

[quote=“goatee, post:36, topic:80372”][quote author=jme_009 link=topic=118045.msg1168252#msg1168252 date=1176759474]

meh sell it in small amounts and get higher amount, or isnt that a good idea?

How are you going to find like 1,000,000 customers? And the more you sell to people, the higher risk you have of being caught. Sure you’ll make less money if you sell it in high amounts but you can get it off your chest quickly and make your money much quicker.

Someone who I buy from if I need some at the last minute recently sold to some 14 year old girls. They went home and their parents caught them with the weed. Of course they would start flipping out and probably scare the shit out of the girls and asked where they got it from. They told them who it was, and so they called the cops and he got busted. He’s on probation and still selling hehe
[/quote]

Whoa i bet he’s pissed at them girls.[/quote]

ooohhhh so where do you get your weed now?
or do you have someone / people to buy it from… ?

Read full topic

item.title: Man thats a lot of weed
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“bootnecklad, post:32, topic:80372”][quote author=The Un-Named link=topic=118045.msg1166026#msg1166026 date=1176705018]
A ton?
[/quote]

Thats what it says, but by somepeoples posts it doesn’t seem to be…
i want it, then sell it, oh and how much is does a gram cost?

if so there is a million grams in a tonne so:

1,000,000 X [how much per gram] = LOADS of £££/$$$/[/quote]

A gram’s cost varies highly it all depends where you live and what the demand is.

Here it’s 5-10 Canadian dollars, which could be considered pretty cheap. However, normally a load like this you would not sell it in grams, you would sell it in ounces or even pounds, and when you buy in bulk the prices are much cheaper.

Read full topic

item.title: Man thats a lot of weed
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:14, topic:80372”]How can you give the number in plants? Plants vary in yield massively

Someone make a guess in weight imo

(Yes, buds vary in weight massively too, fuck you)[/quote]

Well… I mean I tried to picture the buds on the plant and picking them off onto the floor. But, I just realised that pile is a lot bigger then I had first thought. I’m going to say a good 200 pounds of pot. It’s way to hard to tell.

Read full topic
